// Pseudo-code example:

// Control Sizing (Height Sizing)

form
    input.form-control.input-lg
    input.form-control
    input.form-control.input-sm
    
    select.form-control.input-lg
    select.form-control
    select.form-control.input-sm
/form


// Control Sizing (Horizontal Form Group Sizes)

form.form-horizontal
    .form-group.form-group-lg
        label.col-sm-2.control-label
        .col-sm-10
            input.form-control
    .form-group.form-group-sm
        label.col-sm-2.control-label
        .col-sm-10
            input.form-control
/form


// Control Sizing (Column Sizing)

form
    .row
        .col-xs-2
            input.form-control
        .col-xs-3
            input.form-control
        .col-xs-4
            input.form-control
/form
